title: Vladimir Golmak
text:
Vladimir Golmak (; ; born 11 October 1966) is a <a href="Belarus">Belarus</a>ian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and former player. He is currently the head coach of <a href="FC%20Shakhtyor%20Soligorsk">Shakhtyor Soligorsk</a>'s U19 team.
Coaching career.
In 2017 he was a head coach at <a href="FC%20Belshina%20Bobruisk">Belshina Bobruisk</a>.
Honours.
MPKC Mozyr
